channel.title: Dread Metrol
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dread Metrol" - Additional Keith Baker content

item.title: Re: Dread Metrol
item.content:encoded:
I have finished the Mastermaker page, which can be found at this link: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/artificer:mastermaker. Ill be adding it to the Homebrew section of the artificer page, but will need someone else to add it to the frontpage

Thanks

item.title: Dread Metrol
item.content:encoded:
On the wikidot, we've hosted content from some key community figures that technically counts as homebrew, but said creators are developers for the game. One of which is Keith Baker, who we have the Exploring Ebberon content for. I don't think we've actually done his newer release of Dread Metrol, which has more player content and exists to link the ravenloft setting to ebberon.

Just a 'bringing it up' post in case people wanted to add that content to the wikidot
